ValidationRule.description: SDT- 4113 Service Date can be changed only if WO Status IN (New, Pending/Draft, Issued, Sent)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISCHANGED( Service_Date__c ),NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Status))), NOT( OR(ISPICKVAL( Status , "New"), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Pending/Draft"), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Issued"), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Sent"),ISPICKVAL( Status , "Rejected"))), NOT($User.Bypass_Validation__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Service Date can be changed only if WO Status IN (New, Pending/Draft, Issued, Sent,Rejected)
